msg.ko:
[키핀(Keepin) 서비스 종료 안내]

안녕하세요. 메타디움 팀입니다.
키핀 앱은 2024년 9월 30일을 기점으로 모든 서비스를 공식적으로 종료하였습니다.
그동안 키핀 앱을 이용해 주신 모든 분께 진심으로 감사드립니다.

키핀 앱은 더 이상 이용이 불가능하며, 서비스에 대한 모든 지원은 종료되었습니다.

그동안 키핀 앱을 이용해 주신 여러분께 진심으로 감사드리며, 더 이상 서비스하지 못한 점 양해 부탁드립니다.

감사합니다.
msg.en:
[Notice of Termination of Keepin Service]

Hello, this is Metadium team.

As of September 30, 2024, the Keepin app has officially ended all services. We would like to express our sincere gratitude to everyone who has used the Keepin app.

Keepin app is no longer available for use, and all support for the service has been discontinued.

We kindly ask for your understanding regarding the cessation of service.

Thank you.

msg.en:
[Notice of Termination of Keepin Service]

Hello, this is Metadium team.

As of September 30, 2024, the Keepin app has officially ended all services. We would like to express our sincere gratitude to everyone who has used the Keepin app.

Keepin app is no longer available for use, and all support for the service has been discontinued.

We kindly ask for your understanding regarding the cessation of service.

Thank you.
